At  the  hearing  of  the  appeal,  this  Court  had  the  privilege  of  listening  to  the
submissions of the learned Additional Solicitor General, as well as the learned
Counsel for the four accused, and also had the opportunity of scrutinizing the
written submissions tendered by the parties in determining the appeal.
